pages.text: Alright, good job on those Grapes!$(br2)Now let's get some Grapejuice done and craft our first Wine.$(br2)To do so we need to craft some additional Items first.
pages.title: Crafting Grapejuice
Crafting Recipe
pages.text: You can use any sort of Wood to craft it.
Throw your freshly harvested Grapes in and jump on them to produce Grapejuice.

After producing your first Grapejuice you will need a container to take it out and store it.$(br2)So let's get some Wine Bottles and fill them up.$(br2)You can find more about Wine and Wine Recipes in the Consumables Category.
